name: Yigberry Hill
description:
Welcome to Yigberry Hill! This is basically a farming simulator uploaded to the 2022 Cozy Autumn game jam. You can use WASD or arrow keys to move, and use spacebar to plant and check your mailbox as well as sleep.

Big thanks to @❊ 𝑜𝓇𝒶𝓃𝑔𝑒 ❊#6971 for making all the art for this game!

Project made with java
